title: Jayden’s Website
text: Welcome to my website. I’m Jayden, a Bachelor of Information at the University of Toronto.

title: Portfolio
text:
Some data science projects that I’ve completed include:

Analysis on Toronto Major Crime Indicator Data, which uses data from OpenDataToronto and analyzes the trends through secondary sources about relevant current events.
Effects of Mate Competition on Hate Crimes, where I reproduced visualizations of data from Rafaela Dancygier, Naoki Egami, Amaney Jamal, and Ramona Rischke’s paper, Hate Crimes and Gender Imbalances: Fears over Mate Competition and Violence against Refugees
